# SPARSE_NORM_ONE

**Global Variable**

Norm One

## Declaration

```swift
var SPARSE_NORM_ONE: sparse_norm { get }
```

## Discussion

| Matrix element wise | *sumᵢ,ⱼ ( | A[i,j] | )* | |—|—| | Matrix operator | *maxⱼ ( sumᵢ ( | A[i,j] | )* | | Vector element wise | *sqrt( sumᵢ,ⱼ (A[i,j])² )* |

## Constants

- **SPARSE_NORM_TWO**: Norm Two
- **SPARSE_NORM_INF**: Norm Inf
- **SPARSE_NORM_R1**: Norm R1
